components.component:
org.ajax4jsf.Queue org.ajax4jsf.Queue org.ajax4jsf.component.html.HtmlQueue org.ajax4jsf.component.UIQueue
The <a4j:queue> tag.
queue org.ajax4jsf.taglib.html.jsp.QueueTag org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
org.ajax4jsf.QueueRenderer org.ajax4jsf.renderkit.html.QueueRenderer
&ui_component_attributes;
size int Defines the number of requests allowed in the queue at one time.
name java.lang.String Specifies to name for the named queue. ""
requestDelay int Attribute defines the time (in ms) the request will be waiting in the queue before it is ready to be sent.
ignoreDupResponses boolean Attribute allows you to ignore an Ajax response produced by a request if the newest 'similar' request is in the queue already. ignoreDupResponses="true" does not cancel the request while it is processed on the server, but just allows avoiding unnecessary updates on the client side if the response isn't actual now
timeout int Waiting time for response on a particular request. If no response is received during this time, the request is aborted
disabled boolean If "true", disables this component on page.
onsubmit java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called before an ajax request is submitted
onbeforedomupdate java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called before DOM is updated
oncomplete java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called after the request is completed
onerror java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called whenever a JavaScript error occurs
sizeExceededBehavior java.lang.String Defines the strategies of the queue's behavior if the number of the requests waiting in the queue is exceeded. There are four strategies: dropNext (by default), dropNew, fireNext , fireNew.
onsizeexceeded java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called when a size is exceeded
onrequestqueue java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called when the request is added to the queue
onrequestdequeue java.lang.String The client-side script method to be called after the request is removed from the queue
status java.lang.String ID (in format of call UIComponent.findComponent()) of Request status component
rendered
